snippet: Shen Wei Dance Arts, LDP, Circa and María Pagés offered variously acrobatic, aggressive and athletic works on Thursday at Fall for Dance.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews performances by Shen Wei Dance Arts, LDP, Circa and Maria Pages Compania as part of the Fall for Dance festival at City Center.
lead_paragraph: Shen Wei Dance Arts, LDP, Circa and María Pagés offered variously acrobatic, aggressive and athletic works on Thursday at Fall for Dance.

headline.seo: Shen Wei, LDP and María Pagés at Fall for Dance
headline.main: Flashy Moves and Loud Stomping as a Festival Comes to a Close
headline.print_headline: Flashy Moves and Loud Stomping As a Festival Comes to a Close
